item.title: Goddamn Joel on software's new google search appliance.
item.description: So i think it is awesome that seth godin was able to "convince" google to give joel on software a google search appliance. That is amazing. I mean - Joel probably needed a better search engine, but what makes me mad is this: Wikipedia needs a better search engine more than joel on software needs a better search engine. Wikipedia is probably one of the coolest sites on the internet right now.
